anytime: If you have COPD/Asthma, are immunocompromised, or above the age of 50, ask if you should be getting a PCV 20 immunization.
A TDaP is recommended every 10 years, it prevents Tetanus (lockjaw), diphtheria (causes choking), and pertussis (whooping cough).
If you have any medications that are too expensive or you believe are causing you side effects, please let us know.
We have a social worker on staff that can help with issues related to things like housing and linking you with community resources, let us know if you're struggling.
If you're diabetic, make sure you're getting a yearly foot and eye exam. If you need an eye exam, let us know and we can set you up with optometry here at THINK.
